description: Microsoft 365 Planner is part of the Microsoft 365 suite, offering lightweight task and bucket-based planning for teams. This integration supports creating plans, buckets, tasks, fetching them, deleting them, and custom API calls.

actions.name: createBucket
actions.description: Create a bucket (category) under a plan.

actions.name: createTask
actions.description: Create a new planner task with title, assignments, due date, etc.

actions.name: deleteTask
actions.description: Remove a specific task by ID.

actions.name: getABucket
actions.description: Retrieve details about a specific bucket.

actions.name: updatePlan
actions.description: modify metadata of a plan (e.g. title changes).

actions.name: updateTask
actions.description: Modify existing task fields: title, due date, assignments, descriptions.

triggers.name: newPlanCreated
triggers.description: Triggers when a new Plan is created in Microsoft 365 Planner.

triggers.name: newTaskAssignedToUser
triggers.description: Triggers when a Task is assigned to the authenticated user in Microsoft 365 Planner.

triggers.name: newTaskCreated
triggers.description: Triggers when a new Task is created in Microsoft 365 Planner.
